Class AccessWeb

java.lang.Object
  AccessWeb

public class AccessWeb
extends java.lang.Object

Connects to the web page and gets the data from it. Called by the StudentsList class, when the event is done (successful login), will call StudentsList.start()

Author:
Olga Tsibulevskaya

Constructor Detail

AccessWeb

public AccessWeb(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                 javax.swing.JLabel label,
                 StudentList sd)
Creates a new panel to login, sets StudentList data to be used for calling after ActionListeners events

Parameters:
frame - To create new panels (ex. login panel)
label - To print the status of the current operation
sd - StudentsList will be used to call them back after an ActionListener event
